sentences.en: David left his boring job to go on a journey of self-discovery .
sentences.cn: 戴维辞掉了他那份无聊的工作，走上自我发现的道路。

sentences.en: Discovery's takeoff this morning from Cape Canaveral was flawless.
sentences.cn: “发现”号航天飞机今晨从卡纳维拉尔角顺利发射升空。

sentences.en: His discovery was hailed as the botanical find of the century.
sentences.cn: 他的发现被誉为本世纪植物学的最重大发现。

sentences.en: I felt I'd made an incredible discovery.
sentences.cn: 我感到自己有了一个惊人的发现。

sentences.en: The fascination of discovery has never left him.

sentences.en: Their discovery could herald a cure for some forms of impotence.

sentences.en: This discovery disproved the idea that the world was flat.

sentences.en: This discovery seems to validate the claims of popular astrology.
